profile.summary: 6+ years of experience building and shipping production-ready web applications using React, TypeScript, Node.js, and PostgreSQL, with a strong background in IT infrastructure, AI/ML integration, and automation.

projects.title: Jambo Linguists Web Portal
projects.description: Engineered a production-ready management platform for translator assignments, client bookings, and project workflows using React, TypeScript, and Node.js.

projects.title: Kenya School Lab Deployments
projects.description: Lead technician for the infrastructure setup of 10+ school computer labs across Kenya, including networking, hardware installation, and OS configuration.

projects.title: Professional Translation
projects.description: Linguistic expert at Jambo Linguists providing English-Swahili document translation and live interpretation for global clients.

services.title: Full-Stack Development
services.description: Building end-to-end applications with React, Next.js, and TypeScript, backed by robust Node.js/PostgreSQL APIs.

services.title: Infrastructure & DevOps
services.description: Designing deployment pipelines (CI/CD), managing Docker/Kubernetes, and configuring secure network environments.

services.title: Linguistic Services
services.description: Professional English to Swahili translation, localization, and technical interpretation for global markets.
